title: Beany Lentil Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes with juice', '1 1/3 (400g) tins kidney beans, undrained', '1 1/3 (400g) tins chickpeas, undrained', '1 1/3 (400g) tins lentils', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '115g mozzarella cheese, grated']
